name: Project Boost (NeerajRR)
description:
You the player are now in the shoes of a skilled  pilot can you complete all the levels.You'r only Hope a small rocket but don't underestimate the power of this rocket. Be in the shoes of a skilled rocket pilot. Try to complete all the 17 challenging  levels  from mild to the hardest Each level with its own unique set of challenges. Can you complete all the 17 levels. Each level with its unique puzzle gives, and unforgiving mistakes can bring frustration into anyone.

Features:
1. Save & load system implemented

2. Difficult and challenging controls

3. Ps4(Dual Shock 4) Controller Supported

4. Challenging game play and levels

Minimum System Requirements:

CPU: Intel Pentinum b960 or higher

GPU: Intel HD graphics(Any clock speed)

System Memory: 3GB or Higher

Space: ~100 - ~120 MB

Recommended System Requirements:

CPU: Intel Core i5 @1.00Ghz or higher

GPU:Intel UHD graphics or Nvidia mx 250 or higher

System Memory: 6GB or higher

Space: 150 MB

"I really thank you for taking your time to view our game"-Game Dev
